problem.markdown:
>>What are two reasons for adding hierarchies in the Excel data model?<<
[ ] To enable additional filtering capabilities [x] To make it easier for users to select and navigate common paths of data when creating reports and pivot tables [x] To provide logical drill-down capabilities to your reports [ ] To create additional relationships between the tables in the data model.
[explanation] With hierarchies, you can easily select and navigate data when creating reports and pivot tables. In addition, you will be able to use drill-down capabilities in your reports. [explanation]
problem.p: What are two reasons for adding hierarchies in the Excel data model?
